text: Canonical URLs can be edited in the settings of a post here:
<@U02094DEMTK> I need to adjust it for the blog archive page :/ not the individual post

Sorry for the delay,

You can add it from the Blog listing page template editor
I will send you the exact path
<@U05S96AE2N8> You can find it from the settings > pages > SEO & Crawlers
Select the first option from the "Blog Listing Pages"
